title.narrative: Supporting ease of doing business engagement in India on taxes, trade facilitation, land registry and e-governance

description.narrative: HMG experts to assess India's performance on key indicators of the Ease of Doing Business Index such as paying taxes, trade facilitation, land registry and e-governance and recommend better practices. The recommendations, once implemented, will improve India's business environment and benefit both domestic and international businesses.
